articles.title: US job growth blows past expectations, unemployment rate falls to 4.1% - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. job gains increased by the most in six months in September and the unemployment rate fell to 4.1%, pointing to a resilient economy that likely does not need the Federal Reserve to deliver large interest rate cuts for the rest of this year.
